name: Disrupt
description:
Disrupt is a game about protest and making decisions.

Navigate a crowd of protesters as you help people, finding peaceful ways to protest or pushing others to keep up the fight. Dodge an increasing number of enforcers on the hunt for anyone looking to cause trouble. Through chaos or peace, you must join your comrades and push through the authoritarian regime.

Developed in 1 week during the #ResistJam in 2017.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Space to raise fist
  • Shift to run
  • Escape to exit

Also:

Make sure to try and get all 3 unique endings!

Bugs:

There is currently a known bug due to screen scaling. If you resize the window the click events get miss-placed. May fix it in the future, but it will have to be played in its default window size for now.
